Paper.Title: Automatic Evaluation of Summaries Using Document Graphs

Section.Paragraph: Summarization evaluation has been always a challenge to researchers in the document summarization field. Usually, human involvement is necessary to evaluate the quality of a summary.

Here we present a new method for automatic evaluation of text summaries by using document graphs. Data from Document Understanding Conference 2002 (DUC-2002) has been used in the experiment. We propose measuring the similarity between two summaries or between a summary and a document based on the concepts/entities and relations between them in the text.
